column1: Little Goat Diner////It's always a treat to eat in Chicago and Little Goat did not disappoint. I found the atmosphere pleasantly casual
column2: much like the food. Good selection of beers
column3: and the fried stuff really hit the mark for me. I tried the veggie burger
column4: which was one of the best I've ever had
column5: albeit a bit messy. The fries were decent
column6: but a bit thin for my taste. I like them slightly thicker
